item.title: Tutorial: R Code Style for Empirical Economists
item.description: Make your code understandable. IBM's data center in the 1960s, Toronto. Source:ibm-1401.info/ Heuristics, Hunches, & Why the Heck We Care. We hear many horror stories about big names having their results over turned over because of problems in our code. The struggle is real. With this in mind, even simple rules of thumb used in programming can have large payoffs for social scientists. Especially since best practices are never discussed in graduate coursework.
